thread.title: Hilarious Westjet flight attendant makes sassy inflight safety announcement
thread.title_full: Hilarious Westjet flight attendant makes sassy inflight safety announcement

title: Hilarious Westjet flight attendant makes sassy inflight safety announcement
text:
Hilarious Westjet flight attendant makes sassy inflight safety announcement Last updated 08:34, August 17 2015 Facebook/TM'z Veterinary Clinic 
A Westjet flight attendant's inflight safety performance made this flight a little more memorable. 
Inflight safety announcements can be quite a bore, especially when you're a frequent flyer. 
In an effort to retain travellers' attention airlines have turned to everything from internet memes to Hobbits and swimsuit models . 
But sometimes, all it takes is one hilariously sassy flight attendant. Passengers on a Westjet flight bound for Saskatchewan in Canada were treated to an unforgettable safety announcement. 
Flying home from the fabulous TPLO conference.... We had the best in flight crew on West Jet. Laughed so hard. Only had a chance to video the French portion of the pre flight instructions ! Enjoy, we certainly did ! Posted by TM'z Veterinary Clinic on Saturday, 1 August 2015 
The video was posted to Facebook by TM'z Veterinary Clinic with the caption: "Flying home from the fabulous TPLO conference.... We had the best in flight crew on West Jet. Laughed so hard. Only had a chance to video the French portion of the pre flight instructions! Enjoy, we certainly did!" 
The video quickly gained over 7.5 million views and 170, 000 shares. 
Westjet flight attendants have a history of being incredibly entertaining. Earlier this year another flight attendant was filmed getting down to Bruno Mars' Uptown Funk .
